.. -*-mode: rst; coding: utf-8;  -*-

lizpop changelog
==================

v0.3.0 (2012-3-4)

  * Initial release

v0.3.1 (2012-3-11)

  * Fixed bug about printing a non-proper list.

v0.4.0 (2012-4-2)

  * Rewrote `eval` , `macro_expander`, `Listable-class`, and `ScmList-class`,
    in order to improve processing speed. 
  * Fixed bug about non-proper-list terminated by #<none>.
  * Procedure list-copy   
  * (help regular-expression)
